summary: This mod replace the \"Stalhrim Light Helmet\" with the \"Adept Hood\" model.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#5ea2e5]Requires Dragonborn Dlc and 1.9 Patch[/color][/center]

I\'ve seen a screenshot that have stalhrim light armor hooded and there\'s no link to download it... So i\'ve made it by myself.


[b]My mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35361/?]Nature Spell Pack[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35997//?]Dwarven Boots Replacement[/url]
author: cansit
